1370: Dolf was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.

Had a daughter with Katerina, Katerina, at age 28.
Lost daughter Katerina when Katerina was 1 years old.
1371: Had a daughter with Katerina, Waldrada, at age 29.
1373: Had a daughter with Katerina, Gheesen, at age 31.

1377: Lost daughter Leanne when Leanne was 4 years old.
1380: Had a daughter with Katerina, Reynildis, at age 38.
1382: Had a son with Katerina, Weitijn, at age 40.
1383: Had a son with Katerina, Michiel, at age 41.
1384: Had a daughter with Katerina, Badeloghen, at age 42.
1386: Lost son Reynerus when Reynerus was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
